statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // empty'); [ -z "$current_dir" ] && current_dir=$(pwd); cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null || cd "$(pwd)"; user=$(whoami); hostname=$(hostname -s); pwd_short=$(basename "$current_dir"); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"'); git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); status=""; ! git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && status="${status}*"; ! git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null && status="${status}+"; [ -n "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ] && status="${status}?"; upstream=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$upstream" ]; then ahead=$(git rev-list --count HEAD..$upstream 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); behind=$(git rev-list --count $upstream..HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); [ "$behind" != "0" ] && status="${status}↑$behind"; [ "$ahead" != "0" ] && status="${status}↓$ahead"; fi; git_info=" git:$branch$status"; fi; printf "\033[2m%s@%s:%s%s | %s\033[0m" "$user" "$hostname" "$pwd_short" "$git_info" "$model_name"
